Class RuleChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.RuleChecker
  • public class RuleChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Date: Dec 12, 2019 This is a class that does the rule checking, with a few presets for simplification.
    Author:
    Tom√°s Ferreira

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean featureEnvyCheck​(int AFTD, float LAA)
      Most basic Feature Envy preset, with some preset values, in case the user doesn't specify any threshold values.
      boolean featureEnvyCheck​(int AFTD, float LAA, int AFTDLimit, int LAALimit)
      Feature Envy preset, with a preset logic comparison (in this case, AND), in case the user doesn't specify the logic comparison.

      The complete Feature Envy check
